game.name: CyberTruck on Mars
game.description:
Have you watched out the popular movie The Martian? If yes, you know how beautifully the movie has depicted the rescue story that took place on Mars. CyberTruck on Mars will give you a wonderful break if you are a true lover of space movies. Hey! This brand new racing game can also help to make your dream of logging on to Mars come true. Take your seat on your favourite and get ready to ride freely on the surface of Mars!

Your objective in this HTML5 truck game is to sample the soil on the surface of Mars. Make sure to reach at the destined place within the specified time. Wow! You would have 10 unique and challenging tasks to complete and enjoy. Collect the samples from soils and benefit the research organization in the optimum way possible! Remember there no damage takes place with the soils yet. This cool 3D truck driving simulator offers a cool experience since you get a chance to ride multiple types of trucks on Mars.

There are different kinds of cool stuff to explore during this fun and action-packed Mars journey. You as a NASA employee has a plenty of responsibilities to take care of. Common boys! Give it a try to and allow yourself to explore the red planet in a way like never before! Be careful and quick and try to reach the service point before time expires in this monster truck racing game! Check out more truck driving simulators for free to have a blast with your friends!
